fields.Title of Presentation: Parks and Recreation Actively Partnering with Universities: A Win-Win for Agencies, Campuses, and Students
fields.Description/Abstract: Parks and Recreation offer a multitude of programs and are often are looking for viable ways to expand capacity. Come find options on how to build partnerships with Idaho colleges and universities. Presenters will provide details about how to access support through service-learning, internships, real case studies, volunteerism, research, program assessment, and evaluation. Participants will leave with a list of opportunities, tips for success, sample products, next steps, contact information, and other resources. All attendees will be encouraged to share past collaboration experiences with campuses, discuss needs, and describe next steps for their connecting with higher education resources. This interactive presentation is designed for all participants.
